source_sentence: (聖可玉)洞山因僧問如何是空劫已前自己。
translation: (Sheng Keyu) When asked by a monk at Dongshan how was he himself before the empty kalpa, the teacher said, "A white bird enters a reed blossom.
The master said, "A white bird enters a reed blossom.
He whipped up a yellow onion.
Don't teach them to cry on the branches.
When it cries, it startles my concubine's dreams.
I won't go to Liaoxi.
(Commentary in the Main Hall)
At night, Dongshan joined the monks without lighting the stirrup.
A monk came out to ask about retreat.
The master told the attendant to light the stirrup.
He then summoned the saṃgha who had come to ask questions to come out.
The monk approached him.

source_sentence: 師曰將取三兩粉來與者箇上座。
translation: The teacher told him to bring three taels of powder and give it to the elder monk.
The monk waved his sleeves and withdrew.
From then on, he was saved and inspired.

source_sentence: 遂罄捨衣資設齋得三年。
translation: He then gave up all his clothing and set up a fast for three years.
He later asked the master for permission.
The master said, "That's good.
Xuefeng then stood up in wait and asked.
"How could that monk have left?
When did he come back?
The master said.
"He only knew that he was leaving once.
He didn't understand when he would come back.
The saṃgha returned to the hall.
He took his robe and bowl and sat down to be liberated.
Feng reported it to the master.
"The master said, 'Even though it's like this...'
I'm still more alive than the old monk was in his three lives.
In the cave, the sun rises at noon and strikes the third watch.
Then there were travelers who scrambled along the road.
Except for the Chan monk at Mount Huashan.
Who doesn't carry the practice of right and wrong?'
(Maitreya) Dongshan was asked to look at the sick monk.
The monk asked, "What happens when the fire and wind scatter?
The master said.
'When I came, there wasn't a single thing.
When he left, he also let him go.
He said, "What can we do about the debilitating illness?
The teacher said, "You should know that there's someone who isn't sick.
He said, "What's a person who isn't sick?
The master said.
'When I understand it, there's no measure.
If you don't understand it, it's across the mountainside.
He said, "Can you still tell if there's a way forward?
The teacher said.
"Although it's as dark as lacquer.
It's been established at this time.
After the fire and wind scattered, he said.
"One thing calms the long-lasting spirit.
The buddha land is a field of gold, and the heaven is a courtyard of white jade.
The heavenly hall is a white-jade courtyard.
Don't even think about your future journey.
What's attained must be clear.
With a single thought, his mind is purified.
The human world will be tranquil.'
(Nantang Jing)
Dongshan was disturbed.
The monks asked.
"The monk is sick.
"Is there anyone who isn't sick?
The master said there was.
He said, "Does he still look at the monk when he's not sick?
The master said, "The old monk sees that he has a part in it.
He said, "What happens when the monk looks at it?

source_sentence: 師曰老僧看它時則不見有病。
translation: The teacher said when the old monk looked at it, he didn't see any illness.
Mr. Boshan came and said.
"The gate of nonduality is open.
The sun's face and moon's face are always unlike each other.
Dongshan's addiction is sickness.
He doesn't understand it by confusing it.
Their categories aren't aligned.
He's a good doctor in the midst of his illness.
That monk has tendons in his eyes.
There's blood under his skin.
It wouldn't be hard to see Dongshan.
He removes his smelly skin sack.
He takes a lump of red flesh and turns it around.
He straightens his head and nostrils.
He'll directly lower his skull to dry it.
The old doctor had never seen his long-standing fetish.
It's difficult for a young child to meet someone close to him.
When the wild water is thin, the autumn stains subside.
Where the white clouds part, the old mountains are cold.
He needs to be abandoned.
Don't be ungrateful.
I'll take my place when I've exhausted my efforts.
I won't share your position with this lonely mark.
(Tiantong Jue) Spoiling Luwan and Liuwan.
The limit of life only refers to the old escarpment.
Where the sacred groves turn, the white clouds part.
When the hundred birds don't come, spring is just getting cold.

source_sentence: (位中符)洞山因僧問如何是青山白雲父。
translation: (Daoism) Dongshan was asked by a monk how was the father of the white clouds on the green hill.
The master said he didn't think he was the father of a mountain.
He said, "How are the white clouds and the white mountains?
The teacher said, "He doesn't discern east from west.
He said, "How are the white clouds that spend their days leaning?
The teacher said, "I can't get rid of them.
He said, "How is a green mountain that you don't know about?
The teacher said it's the one who doesn't look back.
The river flows and the night spirits cling together.
The wind rolls up the reeds and brings the snow flying with it.
The woman of stone is accustomed to riding the golden phoenix as it dances.
The woodcutter is delighted to straddle the jade dragon and return.
(Vaiśravaṇa) Dongshan attended Xingping.
He simply spread his kit.
He said, "Don't pay homage to an old man.
The teacher said, "I'll pay respect to someone who isn't old and decrepit.
He said, "I don't accept the salutation.
The teacher said, "I haven't paid respects to him.
'You're not an old man.'
He doesn't accept it without reverence.
He was before the Bhīṣma-garjita.
After Vairocana's peak.
He held the white sun in the pot of meditation for a long time.
He touches the blue snake's roar inside the censer.
"A good doctor exhorts a patient.
"It's better to take medicine than to avoid using words.
(Tiantong Jue) "His dignified hall is distinguished.
He sits alone in a deep palace facing the bright sunset.
Even though he may say he doesn't know them, how could he have heard of his family's ugliness from the outside?
How could he have heard of the ugliness of his family from outside?'
(Nying Yuandi) Zongjian falin, vol. 59
